title: 3 and Out - Miami Tua Crisis, Trust Belichick, Urban's Vaxx Blunder, Sark/Eddie O Pressure, Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Miami Tua Crisis, Trust Belichick, Urban's Vaxx Blunder, Sark/Eddie O Pressure, Mailbag
description:
John explains why the Dolphins' public flirtations with Deshaun Watson put Tua in an impossible position, why cutting Cam isn't an indictment on Belichick, and gives some rapid fire takes on the top NFL headlines, including Urban Meyer's recent vaccine comment blunder, and Tony Dungy's pearl clutching take on sports gambling. He also looks at the big-time pressure facing Sark and Eddie O to open the CFB season, and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag . Follow John on Twitter and subscribe NOW to get all the latest 3 and Out content!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
